clauses.title: Your identity is used in ads that are shown to other users
clauses.description:
Ads shown to other users may include a reference to you as an implied endorsement.
Might give away information about your own personal lifestyle to strangers.
clauses.clause_text:
We use information about you where you have given us consent to do so for a specific purpose not listed above. . For example, we may publish testimonials or featured customer stories to promote the Services, with your permission.

If you have consented to our use of information about you for a specific purpose, you have the right to change your mind at any time, but this will not affect any processing that has already taken place.

case.text: Your identity is used in ads that are shown to other users

clauses.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
clauses.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Information you contribute to blogs, forums, and related discussion areas – along with your profile information – will be may be read, collected, and used by any member of the public who accesses these websites. . Your posts and certain profile information may remain even after you terminate your account. We urge you to consider the sensitivity of any information you input into these Services.

case.text: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

clauses.title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>We may retain logs of automatically collected information (for internal analytics).
your email address.
your tax information.
communications with you.
and your transactional information (for auditing, tax, and financial purposes).
When we no longer have a legitimate business interest in retaining data, we will delete or anonymize it.

case.text: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes including advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
Advertising cookies: These cookies are used to deliver adverts more relevant to you and your interests.
They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as to help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
They are usually placed by advertising networks with Prezi’s – as the Website operator’s – permission.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
Prezi reserves the right, at its discretion, to modify this Agreement at any time by posting a notice on its website, http://prezi.com, or by sending you a notice via email or postal mail.
You shall be responsible for reviewing and becoming familiar with any such modifications.
Use of the Software or any Prezi Service by you following such notification constitutes your acceptance of the terms and conditions of this Agreement as modified.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text: Information you Share (Account Information, Payment Information, Support Information, Survey Information, Content Information); Information About Others (Contact Information); Additional Information (Use of the Services, From Third Party Services, Linked Services, Cookies/Web Beacons..., From Partners and Service Providers).

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: If we receive legal process pertaining to your account or have other legal document retention requirements, we will retain your data for as long as we in good faith believe is necessary to comply with our preservation obligations. Similarly, if we believe that your account has been involved in wrongdoing, we may preserve your Personal Data to defend or assert our rights.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text:
"When you visit our websites, sign in into our Services, interact with our email notifications, or visit a third-party service that includes content from our Services, we may receive information about you, or combine such information with other personal information."

This means that by visiting certain third party websites, Prezi will collect and combine your information.

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>You agree that Prezi may, at its sole discretion and without prior notice, terminate your account, your access to the Service, and/or block your future access to the Service.
By way of example, but not by way of limitation, we may terminate your account if we determine that you have violated this Agreement or other agreements or guidelines that may be associated with your use of the Service.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: <b>The Services, our service providers, linked services, and third party content and/or functionality that appears on the Services may use cookies and other tracking tools including web beacons, pixel tags, clear GIFs, and the like.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: In the course of providing such services to us, these companies may obtain information about you, including personal information, and that information will be shared with us.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: Where you use multiple Services (e.g., Prezi Desktop, Prezi on the web or mobile device), we combine information about you and your activities to provide an integrated experience, such as to allow you to find information from one Service while searching from another or to present relevant information as you travel across our websites.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: <b>Where required by law or where we believe it is necessary to protect our legal rights, legitimate interests and those of others, we may use or disclose information about you in connection with legal claims, compliance, regulatory, and audit functions,

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
Your use of the Service after the date such change(s) become effective will constitute consent to the changed terms.
If you do not agree to the changes, you must immediately stop using the Service.
Otherwise, the new terms will apply to you.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
clauses.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.
clauses.clause_text: "PREZI AND THE PREZI AFFILIATES MAKE NO WARRANTY THAT [...] AND (e) ANY DEFECTS IN THE OPERATION OR FUNCTIONALITY OF THE SERVICE OR RELATED SOFTWARE WILL BE CORRECTED."

case.text: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected

clauses.title: You waive your right to a class action.
clauses.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>Notwithstanding the foregoing, either party may bring an individual action in small claims court if its claims are within that court’s jurisdiction and are pending only in that court.
You agree that, by entering into this Agreement, you and Prezi are each waiving the right to a trial by jury or to participate in a class action.
This Agreement evidences a transaction in interstate commerce, and thus the Federal Arbitration Act governs the interpretation and enforcement of this provision.

case.text: You waive your right to a class action.

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: This service can license user content to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: "With respect to Public User Content, you hereby do and shall grant to Prezi (and its successors, assignees, and third-party service providers) a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, fully paid, sublicensable, and transferable license"

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.
clauses.clause_text: From time to time, we may ask our registered users or visitors to participate in surveys. These surveys are optional. If you choose to participate, any information you provide to us, including personal information, will be linked with your account in our system. If you would not like your information to be used in this way, you have the option to not participate in surveys or, if you do participate, to provide us only with information you consent to our use of in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

case.text: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: "This service usage information includes data such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, the referring web page, pages visited within our Services, location, your mobile carrier, device information (including device and application IDs), search terms, and cookie information."

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text:
Market

Send you information or materials via email about products, offers, and news we think might interest you. In specific cases where we have your consent and you have provided us additional contact information, we may contact you through other channels including telephone. These communications are aimed at driving engagement and maximizing what you get out of the Services, including information about new features, survey requests, newsletters, and events we think may be of interest to you. . We also communicate with you about new product offers, promotions, and contests of Prezi Inc. or its licensees or selected commercial partners.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted advertising through Facebook.
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text:
For example, we use Facebook Custom Audiences to promote specific our Services on through Facebook’s ad platform.
We do not promote other products or services that are not related to Prezi Inc.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text: In compliance with law; for Legitimate Interests; Activity Processing (Providing Services, Development, Conduct Research, Personalized Experiences, Communications, Marketing, First-Party/Third-Party Advertising, Support, Promoting Safety/Security); Legal Rights (Mergers/Business Transfers, Disclosure to Law); Other Objections w/Consent (Third Party Disclosures)

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
clauses.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.
clauses.clause_text: If you are not a user from a Designated Country, we may retain a back-up copy of your Private or Public User Content potentially with Personal Data in it, indefinitely.

case.text: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

clauses.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>We use others to help us provide our Services.
This includes helping us do application development, hosting, maintenance, backup, storage, virtual infrastructure, payment processing, fraud detection, marketing, and analysis.
Third-party service providers have access to your information as reasonably necessary to perform these tasks on our behalf

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: This service throttles your use
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: Also, if a particular piece of content creates too large a demand on the Service, it may result in access to the content being temporarily or permanently disabled.

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text:
Advertise

Target ads to registered users, visitors, and others through a variety of advertising partners. In some cases, we also use information including service usage information, and information from web beacons, pixels, and cookies, and device identifiers that we collect as mentioned above to better understand how to promote and advertise our Services to you.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
In accordance with the GDPR and other applicable privacy laws, we may transfer your Personal Data from your country of residence to the U.S. (or other countries) and we process data both inside and outside of the United States and rely on legally-provided mechanisms to lawfully transfer data across borders (e.g. Binding Corporate Rules or Standard Contractual Clauses or safe harbor programs).

Some of the third parties described in this Privacy Policy, which provide services to us under contract, are based in other countries that may have laws that are different, and potentially not as protective, as the laws of your country of residence. When we share information of our users in the Designated Countries, we make use of European Commission-approved Standard Contractual Data Protection Clauses, Binding Corporate Rules for transfers to data processors, or other appropriate legal mechanisms to safeguard the transfer.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
clauses.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account, since you granted them a perpetual or (in some cases) an unlimited license over that content.
clauses.clause_text: This license ends one year after you delete your Public User Content or your account is closed (either by you or by us), except (i) to the extent that your Public User Content has been shared with others and they have not deleted it and (ii) that we retain a license to maintain a back-up copy of your Public User Content indefinitely.

case.text: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account

clauses.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.
clauses.clause_text: If you do choose to create an account and become a member, you must provide us with some personal information so that we can provide our services to you including your name, email address and/or phone number, occupation, title, and a password.

case.text: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
Another of our service providers is Google Analytics, which collects information such as how often users visit this site, what pages they visit when they do so, and what other sites they used prior to coming to this site.
To learn more about how Google Analytics collects and uses your data when you use the Service, and how you can control the information sent to Google Analytics, please review https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid 6 months prior.
clauses.clause_text: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE TOTAL LIABILITY OF PREZI, AND ITS SUPPLIERS AND DISTRIBUTORS, FOR ANY CLAIM UNDER THESE TERMS, INCLUDING FOR ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES, IS LIMITED TO THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US TO USE THE SERVICES OVER THE PRIOR SIX-MONTH PERIOD.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
clauses.clause_text:
How can I control or delete cookies?

You can see the cookie list and change your cookie settings here, or you can turn off all cookies, if you prefer not to receive them. You can also have your computer warn you whenever cookies are being used.

Most internet browsers are initially set up to automatically accept cookies. You can change the settings to block cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent to your device. There are a number of ways to manage cookies.

case.text: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: "When you visit our websites, sign in into our Services, interact with our email notifications, or visit a third-party service that includes content from our Services, we may receive information about you, or combine such information with other personal information."

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.
clauses.clause_text: You don’t have to create an account to use some of our service features, such as searching and viewing public presentations.

case.text: No need to register

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: <b>Regardless of whether you designate content public or private, Prezi makes no claim of ownership to your User Content and obtains no rights to your content other than as provided for herein.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: Prezi cookies do not collect personal information from you, and we do not combine the general information collected through cookies with other personal information you may provide to personally identify you.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
12.3 Right to delete data

You have the right to ask us to erase or delete your Personal Data. In some cases (for example, information previously posted in public areas) it may not be practical or may be unduly burdensome, to delete your Personal Data. In the event that we may not delete your Personal Data, we will inform you.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: The laws of the State of California, excluding California’s conflict of laws rules, will apply to any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms or the Prezi Services.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: We keep your Personal Data in a form that enables us to identify you for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which your Personal Data is processed.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
clauses.clause_text: Please exercise discretion concerning those you share your private content with.

case.text: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>9.
How we use and process your Personal Data

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text:
12.8 How to exercise your rights

At any time, you may exercise your rights as described in this article by sending an email to privacy@prezi.com. In the email please provide specific details about the right you are exercising. Once we receive the communication, we will respond as quickly as possible and without delay. Depending on the request, it might take us some time to respond, but we will endeavor to do so within 30 days of receiving your request.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
5.
What personal data we collect and why

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.
clauses.clause_text:
<b>We review our Privacy Policy on a regular basis.
This Privacy Policy may be amended from time to time, and if we make material changes to it, we will provide you notice through the Services, or by other appropriate means (including but not limited to email, via this page or via the user interface).

case.text: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: "We use others to help us provide our Services. This includes helping us do application development, hosting, maintenance, backup, storage, virtual infrastructure, payment processing, fraud detection, marketing, and analysis. Third-party service providers have access to your information as reasonably necessary to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for other purposes. All our service providers must meet our security and privacy standards before they gain access to any of your information."

clauses.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
clauses.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.

case.text: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: Here’s a quick look at the strict principles we live by in order to earn your trust and keep it.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text:
You may cancel your account and you may opt-out of receiving marketing emails from us at any time.
In order to cancel your account, opt-out of, or modify your personal information, you must do so by logging in and visiting your Settings &amp.
Account page and following the instructions provided, or go to our Help &amp.
Support page.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.clause_text: <b>With respect to Public User Content, you hereby do and shall grant to Prezi (and its successors, assignees, and third-party service providers) a worldwide, non-exclusive,

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: You can choose the copyright license
clauses.description: You have the right to choose or change the license over content you publish through the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
If your content is designated as Public User Content, you may choose to “allow re-use” of that content (in the case of videos that are designated Public User Content, you are required to allow re-use).
When you allow re-use of your Public User Content, you hereby do and shall grant to each user of the Service a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, store, reproduce, modify, create derivative works, communicate to the public, publish, publicly perform, publicly display, distribute and transmit your User Content, and portions thereof as permitted by the Prezi Services.

clauses.title: You can choose with whom you share content
clauses.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.
clauses.clause_text:
Regardless of whether your User Content has been designated as Public User Content or Private User Content, you may choose to share a presentation, video or other User Content in a manner that allows the person you’ve shared such User Content with (a “Co-editor”) to reuse or edit that User Content, or portions thereof as permitted by the Prezi Services.
You can learn more about sharing with edit rights here.

case.text: You can choose with whom you share content

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text:
You agree to indemnify and hold Prezi and/or the Prezi Affiliates harmless from and against any and all liabilities and costs (including reasonable attorney’s fees) incurred by Prezi and/or the Prezi Affiliates in connection with any claim arising out of your breach of the Agreement.
Prezi reserves the right, at its own expense, to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter otherwise subject to indemnification by you.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Please be aware, however, that when you choose to reject cookies, this choice may limit the functionality of the Website and you may lose access to some of its features.

clauses.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
clauses.clause_text:
